column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm not big on barbeque
column2: but this place was great. I had the pulled pork sandwich
column4: the mac 'n' cheese and the peach cobbler. it was fantastic! I was surprised at how quickly the place filled up. a line started to wrap around the outer exterior of the restaurant. if you've made plans to eat at Smoque and are anticipating yourself being hungry in an hour
column5: I would suggest leaving for the restaurant then because there is a bit of a wait and after the wait you'll be famished.
